short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brawl Stars wallpaper turn new tab to HD Brawl Stars background. Custom Brawl Stars wallpaper themes for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate the Brawl Stars wallpaper with each new tab opening.
2. Set a random Brawl Stars background or select your favorite through the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Shortcut to frequently visited websites.
8. Quick link to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut addition feature for quick website access.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Quick access to Download wallpapers.
14. Instant access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Brawl Stars new tab.
